mapper.select: SELECT z.* FROM ( SELECT a.emp_code, e.code_name pay_type, b.work_day, b.start_time, b.end_time, b.bigo, c.code_name position, d.code_name duty FROM empmaster a LEFT JOIN workmaster b ON ( a.emp_code = b.emp_code ) LEFT JOIN codemaster c ON ( a.position = c.code AND c.group_type = 'position' ) LEFT JOIN codemaster d ON ( a.duty = d.code AND d.group_type = 'duty' ) LEFT JOIN codemaster e ON ( a.pay_gubun = e.code AND e.group_type = 'payType' ) ) z WHERE z.work_day BETWEEN #{sDate} AND #{eDate}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO workmaster ( emp_code, work_day, start_time, bigo ) VALUES ( #{empCode}, #{workDay}, sysdate, #{bigo:VARCHAR} )
